io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.schedule

Class ScheduleEffects

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.schedule.ScheduleEffects

  • public class ScheduleEffects
extends java.lang.Object
    A local interface for a schedule's effects. Schedule effects define whether a schedule will change to another effect when run. Schedule effects are only included in schedule objects if the schedule wants to change the effect on the Aurora. The setter methods in this class will not have an effect on the Aurora.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScheduleEffects(boolean randomOn, RandomType randomType, java.lang.String effectName)
      Create a new schedule effects object that defines whether the effect will be randomly chosen or specified.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScheduleEffects

        public ScheduleEffects(boolean randomOn,
                       RandomType randomType,
                       java.lang.String effectName)
        Create a new schedule effects object that defines whether the effect will be randomly chosen or specified.
        Parameters:
        randomOn - if the effect should be randomly chosen
        randomType - the type of effects that should be randomly chosen
        effectName - the name of a specific effect that should be chosen (must be null if randomOn is true)
